alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 10:44AM CDT until April 11 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Dallas Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Millers Ferry Dam. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 66 feet, farm and pasturelands in the area will flood and cattle should be moved to higher ground. At 68 feet, Millers Ferry Park begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 65.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 66.8 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 66.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
